ags:resource.dc:title: Research and innovation for sustainable agriculture and food and nutrition security
ags:resource.dc:subject: innovation systems
is institutional
m&e
ags:resource.dc:creator: EC

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: This report is about the DEVCO approach to AR4D in the context of how well it responds to current policy priorities in sustainable agriculture, nutrition and resilience, and how it is positioned within the European and global agenda to achieve maximum impact. The approach builds on lessons learned and reviews and evaluations of research under AR4D portfolio under the Food Security Thematic Programme.
